headline: How Investors Are Reacting To Carrier Global (CARR) DOE‑Validated Cold‑Climate Rooftop Heat Pump Trials
summary: In December 2025, Carrier Global announced it had begun commercial field trials of its next-generation 10–14 ton rooftop heat pump at a large national retailer in upstate New York after completing U.S. Department of Energy lab verification testing that confirmed strong cold-climate performance and compliance with DOE efficiency thresholds. By progressing through DOE, Oak Ridge and National Renewable Energy Laboratory testing with technology aimed at lowering energy use and supporting grid...
